revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Wooden barrel | class = Barrel | game = Heretic | doomednum = 44 }}[[Classes]]: Barrel
A wooden barrel from Heretic, slightly more massive-looking than Hexen's own [[Classes:ZBarrel|wooden barrel]]. Unlike the [[Classes:ExplosiveBarrel|Doom barrel]], it cannot be moved and will not explode. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Barrel { {{Property|Radius}} 12 {{Property|Height}} 32 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: BARL A -1 Stop } }
